subject: Hiring of manpower for Data Lake Operations- reg.
text: HRay <4 rTHRfufetarot (Tew 4dev & TTTHRf TiT4, MRT TRTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 8r444 Tn iil-5 Qa 6, 8az7-10, &Re5; 7f @arlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10_ Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ IT/2022 Policy Circular No. 6.30/2022 dated April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/IT/2021/ITManpower-PIUs(Part-File-1) (Computer No: 65873)} Sub:: Hiring of IT manpower for Data Lake Operations reg: Ref _ (i) Circular No. NHAI/IT/ Data Lake/2021/07 dated 01.03.2021. (ii) Circular No. NHAI/IT / Data Lake/2021/07 dated 29.06.2021. With the approval of Competent Authority, one manpower was   sanctioned to All Members; CGMs at NHAI-HQ, ROs & PDs exclusively for updation of data in Data Lake Portal; initially for a period of one year extendable for another 1 year subject to requirement, performance & approval of the Competent Authority. 2 _ The Data Lake operators at all levels viz. PIUs and CGMs at NHAI, HQ were imparted comprehensive training by Data Lake team: The weekly, monthly input into the Data Lake System have been standardised. Further , vide OM dated 15.03.2022, the basic Standard Operating Procedures (SoPs) encompassing duties to be performed by Data Lake Operators were issued and concerned reporting officer viz. CGMs, ROs, etc. were requested to monitor the performance of these operators. 3_ The request for extension of Data Lake operators are received from ROs and the matter was reviewed in IT division; It was observed that the output of most of the Data Lake operators are not up to the mark and the expenditure has not yielded desired results. 4_ Accordingly, the following has been decided by the Competent Authority: 1. Extension should not be given to those Data Lake operators who are not performing and the decision in this regard rests with the concerned reporting officer ji. Asmall set-up be created at PIU level comprising of Data Entry/ Computer Operators/ Data Lake Operator who have to mandatorily follow the activities as defined in the SoP'$ dated 45.03.2022 issued by IT division; Preference has to be given to the Dy Managers Managers for imparting the responsibility of updating Data Lake  Only under exceptional cases if Dy Manager Manager position is vacant then for updating Data Lake, an operator may be deployed: In no case extension of Data Lake operator be carried beyond year as approved by the competent authority vide letter dated 01.03.2021. ii. Engaging / extension of Data Entry/ Computer Operators/ Data Lake Operator should be judicially and purely be on need basis, under intimation to CGM(IT) at NHAI HQ: iv The ROs / PDs   shall have to certify  monthly progress report of such resource by confirming that the activities defined under the above referred SoPs are successfully completed, before releasing their bills.
